About me

My name is Svetlana

I’m a Front-End Developer located in Montenegro. I moved here from Saint-Petersburg. Returned from bank clerk to WEB-developer.
I have a strong passion for HTML and CSS, animations and creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences.
I’m well-organised person, problem solver, independent employee with high attention to detail. I’m a fan of WEB-development, my cat Groot, rock-climbing, outdoor activities, amazing series and English lessons. A family person and IT specialist’s wife.
Interested in the entire frontend spectrum and working on ambitious projects with positive people.

WEB-development
Write and read HTML, CSS, JavaScript/TypeScript.
Understand and know preprocessors SASS/SCSS.
Work with libraries - Bootstrap и Grid Layout.
UI/UX Design
Create a delightful user experience through your product’s visual language.
App development

My skills

What I use in my work

HTML5

It is creates the framework of your site or application, and the fifth version will allow me to create a more SEO-optimized structure of your product

CSS3

This style language allows me to create absolutely any look for your site or application. Everything is limited only by your imagination!

Java Script

This language allows me to animate anything: sliders, windows, tooltips, tabs, receiving data from the server and much more.

Jquery

The Jquery library will speed up development. We will not use this into the project without needs, but I have the skill of working with it.

React

This library allows me to create web applications. We can create the most interactive product for your purposes.

Node.js

This platform allows me to create a backend for your product - "brains" that will perform actions that the user does not see

Mongo.db

This is a non-relational database that will store your website or app.
